com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui

Class ViewElementBuilderContextInterceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilderContextInterceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor

    public class ViewElementBuilderContextInterceptor
extends Object
implements org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerInterceptor
    Registers a global ViewElementBuilderContext on the request and attaches it as the current thread-local builder context.

    Extend this interceptor if you want to register additional default attributes.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
